cast.name: 德米特里·库利奇科夫 Dmitriy Kulichkov
艾琳娜·谢尔盖娃 Alina Sergeyeva
马克西姆·维托尔甘 Maksim Vitorgan
伊琳娜·杰尼索娃 Irina Denisova

awards:
第66届戛纳电影节(2013)
　　金摄影机奖(导演首作奖)(提名) 泰西亚·伊古蒙特塞娃

director.name: 泰西亚·伊古蒙特塞娃 Taisia Igumentseva

introduction: A village so small all the residents not only knows each other, but also can easily recognize the neighbor's cow face a frightful news. It was announced on TV that the most powerful coronal mass ejection in the Earth's history would take place. Humankind has only 24 hours left. The world runs mad in different ways getting ready for the apocalypse, and a unique local scenario of waving the life goodbye is inverted in the village. Tables are put together, pies are baked, and some gather strength and courage to make the most important decisions of their lives... But what about the doomsday? It just doesn't arrive. Oops, got it wrong! The situation is heating up. Everybody realize they can't go on as they did before.
